data.oai_dc:dc: This is a zipped folder containing: 1) the original alignment prior to analyses, 2) the input file for MP (Paup) analyses with recoded ambiguously aligned regions and step matrices, 3) the input file for ML (Paup) analyses, 4) the input file for ML (RAxML) with ambiguously aligned regions recorded, 5) the input file for BI (MrBayes) analyses.
species concepts|semi-cryptic species|cryptic species|morphology|sterile crustose lichens
